title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
EB: 2. After removing the working set, the package view should no longer be filtered.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 
2. Verify that the package view is filtered. 
3. Remove the working set. 
4. Verify that the package view is no longer filtered.
